title: Adhaaru Adhaaru Lyrics Yennai Arindhaal Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Yennai Arindhaal Adhaaru Adhaaru Lyrics .
Singer(s): Vijay Prakash & Gaana Bala

Source- Youtube

Vaa raaja vaa vaa
Ada idhaan un daavaa
Yenga ellaarukkum no va
Nenju valikudhu slow-ah.

Aanadhu aachu
namma kaiyya meeri pochu
Adi yaen vetti pechu
romba sokkaakkeedhu match-u

Lungiyathaan thookki kattu
Dustu padudhu.
Selayaththaan yaethi kattu
Hip-pu theridhu. (2)

Mangi pona moonji ellaam
Daaladikkudhu.
Songi pona namma janam
Kooththadikkudhu.

Adhaaru adhaaru adhaaru adhaaru
Udhaaru udhaaru kaattaadhe udhaaru (2)

Ellaamey inimel nallaathaan nadakkum,
Pattaasum summaave koluththaama
vedikkum.

Adhaaru adhaaru adhaaru adhaaru
Udhaaru udhaaru kaattaadhe udhaaru
Ellaamey inimel nallaathaan nadakkum,
Pattaasum summaave koluththaama
vedikkum.

Vaasa malli vaasam versa
Vaasal variyaa.
Un aasai ellaam yaeththukkathaan
Naanum illaya. (2)

De collarathaan thookkaamale
Aada variya.
Bigul adichchi ragala seiyya
Neeyum ready ya. (2)

Adhaaru adhaaru adhaaru adhaaru
Udhaaru udhaaru kaattaadhe udhaaru.(2)

Vaazhai kattum Vella
master of kola kolla.
Lighta kattum vichu
nalla poduvaanda sketchu.
galeeju raaidu
parisuththamaana fraud-u..
ho haiyo ..oh ho haiyo

pandhala kattum mayilu
ivan porandha idam jailu.
pandhiya paakkura baala
vaaikku arisi poduvaan dhoolaa.
panneera thellikkum john-u
avan sumaara poduvaan scene-u.
ho haiyo ..oh ho haiyo..

ada ellaam onnaa seru
podu orae thattula soru.
enga ellaroda natpu
kadal kaathtthula kaladnha uppu..

Adhaaru adhaaru adhaaru adhaaru
Udhaaru udhaaru kaattaadhe udhaaru.(2)

Lungiyathaan thookki kattu
Dustu padudhu.
Selayaththaan suththi kattu
Hip-pu theridhu.

Mangi pona moonji ellaam
Daaladikkudhu. (Machi)
Songi pona namma janam
Kooththadikkudhu. (2)

Vaa raaja vaa vaa
Ada idhaan un daavaa
Yenga ellaarukkum no va
Nenju valikudhu slow-ah.

Aanadhu aachu
namma kaiyya meeri pochu
Adi yaen vetti pechu
romba sokkaakkeedhu match-u

Lungiyathaan thookki kattu
Dustu padudhu.
Selayaththaan yaethi kattu
Hip-pu theridhu.
